text: Futhi (khumbula) ngesikhathi uMvelinqangi ethi, “Oh Jesu! Ngizokuthatha ngikukhuphulele kumina ngizokuhlanza kulabo abangakholwa futhi ngenze labo abakulandelayo babe ngaphezulu kwalabo abangakholwa kuze kube usuku lokuvuka kwabafileyo, ngakho-ke niyobuyela kumina futhi ngiyokwahlulela phakathi kwenu kulokho enaniphikisana ngakho”
